request.description: Add a new DeviceProfile (and associated Command objects) - name must be unique. Returns ServiceException (HTTP 503) for unknown or unanticipated issues. Returns DataValidationException (HTTP 409) if an associated command's name is a duplicate for the profile.

body.raw:
name: "yaml thermostat profile"
description: "BACnet Honeywell thermostats"
manufacturer: "Honeywell"
model: "ABC123"
labels: 
  - "bacnet"
  - "thermostat"
  - "Honeywell"
  
commands:
  - name: "cooling point"
    get:
        path: "/cooling"
        responses:
          - code: "200"
            description: "not a float"
            expectedValues: 
              - "temperature"
    put:
        path: "/cooling" 
        responses:
          - code: "200"
            description: "not a float"
            expectedValues: 
              - "temperature"
        parameters:
          - name: "coolingpoint"
            value: "cooling"

Returns DataValidationException (HTTP 409) if an associated command's name is a duplicate for the profile. Returns ClientException (HTTP 400) if the YAML file is empty.

  - "Honeywell"
  
commands:
  - name: "cooling point"
    get:
        path: "/cooling"
        responses:
          - code: "200"
            description: "not a float"
            expectedValues: 
              - "temperature"
    put:
        path: "/cooling" 
        responses:
          - code: "200"
            description: "not a float"
            expectedValues: 
              - "temperature"
        parameters:
          - name: "coolingpoint"
            value: "cooling"
